content:
TITLE: Configuring Rspack for UMD Library Build in JavaScript DESCRIPTION: This snippet defines the Rspack configuration for building a UMD library. It specifies the entry point, output settings, and module rules for processing JavaScript files. SOURCE: https://github.com/rspack-contrib/rstack-examples/blob/main/rspack/library-umd/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: javascript CODE: ``` /** * @type {import('@rspack/cli').Configuration} */ module.exports = { context: __dirname, entry: { main: "./src/index.js", }, output: { path: "dist", filename: "umd-library.js", library: { type: "umd", name: "umdLibrary", }, globalObject: "this", }, target: ["web", "es5"], builtins: { html: [{ template: "./index.html" }] }, module: { rules: [ { test: /\.js$/, use: [ { loader: "builtin:swc-loader", options: { jsc: { parser: { syntax: "ecmascript", }, }, }, }, ], type: "javascript/auto", }, ], }, }; ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring Rspress Homepage Layout in YAML DESCRIPTION: Homepage configuration that defines the hero section with title, tagline, actions, and logo image, followed by six feature sections highlighting key capabilities like build speed and MDX support. Each feature includes a title, details and icon. SOURCE: https://github.com/rspack-contrib/rstack-examples/blob/main/rspress/basic/docs/index.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: yaml CODE: ``` pageType: home hero: name: Rspress text: Rspack-based Static Site Generator tagline: Rspress tagline actions: - theme: brand text: Quick Start link: /guide/ - theme: alt text: Github link: https://github.com/web-infra-dev/rspress image: src: /rspress-icon.png alt: Rspress Logo features: - title: Blazing fast build speed details: The core compilation module is based on the Rust front-end toolchain, providing a more ultimate development experience. icon: üèÉüèª‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è - title: Support for MDX content writing details: MDX is a powerful way to write content, allowing you to use React components in Markdown. icon: üì¶ - title: Built-in full-text search details: Automatically generates a full-text search index for you during construction, providing out-of-the-box full-text search capabilities. icon: üé® - title: Simpler I18n solution details: With the built-in I18n solution, you can easily provide multi-language support for documents or components. icon: üåç - title: Static site generation details: In production, it automatically builds into static HTML files, which can be easily deployed anywhere. icon: üåà - title: Providing multiple custom capabilities details: Through its extension mechanism, you can easily extend theme UI and build process. icon: üî• ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Custom Container Syntax in Rspress Markdown DESCRIPTION: Examples of using custom containers with the ::: syntax in Rspress to create tip, info, warning, danger, and details blocks with custom titles. SOURCE: https://github.com/rspack-contrib/rstack-examples/blob/main/rspress/basic/docs/guide/index.md#2025-04-21_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` :::tip This is a `block` of type `tip` ::: :::info This is a `block` of type `info` ::: :::warning This is a `block` of type `warning` ::: :::danger This is a `block` of type `danger` ::: ::: details This is a `block` of type `details` ::: :::tip Custom Title This is a `block` of `Custom Title` ::: :::tip{title="Custom Title"} This is a `block` of `Custom Title` ::: ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring Rspress Homepage with Hero Section and Features DESCRIPTION: YAML configuration that defines the homepage structure for Rspress, a Rspack-based static site generator. It includes a hero section with title and action buttons, and six feature highlights with titles, descriptions and icons. SOURCE: https://github.com/rspack-contrib/rstack-examples/blob/main/rspress/custom-theme/docs/index.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: yaml CODE: ``` --- pageType: home hero: name: Rspress text: Rspack-based Static Site Generator tagline: Rspress tagline actions: - theme: brand text: Quick Start link: /hello/ - theme: alt text: Github link: https://github.com/web-infra-dev/rspress features: - title: Blazing fast build speed details: The core compilation module is based on the Rust front-end toolchain, providing a more ultimate development experience. icon: üèÉüèª‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è - title: Support for MDX content writing details: MDX is a powerful way to write content, allowing you to use React components in Markdown. icon: üì¶ - title: Built-in full-text search details: Automatically generates a full-text search index for you during construction, providing out-of-the-box full-text search capabilities. icon: üé® - title: Simpler I18n solution details: With the built-in I18n solution, you can easily provide multi-language support for documents or components. icon: üåç - title: Static site generation details: In production, it automatically builds into static HTML files, which can be easily deployed anywhere. icon: üåà - title: Providing multiple custom capabilities details: Through its extension mechanism, you can easily extend theme UI and build process. icon: üî• --- ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Enabling Default Code Wrapping in Rspress DESCRIPTION: Configuration example showing how to enable default wrapping for long code lines in the Rspress config file. SOURCE: https://github.com/rspack-contrib/rstack-examples/blob/main/rspress/basic/docs/guide/index.md#2025-04-21_snippet_7 LANGUAGE: typescript CODE: ``` export default { // ... markdown: { defaultWrapCode: true, }, }; ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Describing Module Federation Interoperability in Markdown DESCRIPTION: This Markdown snippet provides an overview of the example project, highlighting its purpose to demonstrate interoperability between different module federation implementations across Rspack and webpack. SOURCE: https://github.com/rspack-contrib/rstack-examples/blob/main/rspack/module-federation-interop/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: Markdown CODE: ``` # module-federation-interop This is the example shows different project using different module federation implementation (Rspack module federation v1, Rspack module federation v1.5 and webpack module federation), and interop with each other. ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Using React Components in MDX Files DESCRIPTION: Example of importing and using React components within an MDX file, demonstrating the capability to combine Markdown with React. SOURCE: https://github.com/rspack-contrib/rstack-examples/blob/main/rspress/basic/docs/guide/index.md#2025-04-21_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: mdx CODE: ``` // docs/index.mdx import { CustomComponent } from './custom'; # Hello World ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Running Next.js Development Server with Rspack DESCRIPTION: This command starts the Next.js development server using Rspack as the bundler. SOURCE: https://github.com/rspack-contrib/rstack-examples/blob/main/rspack/next-rspack-page-router/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: shell CODE: ``` pnpm dev ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Accessing Front Matter Properties in Markdown DESCRIPTION: Example showing how to access properties defined in front matter within the document body using the frontmatter object. SOURCE: https://github.com/rspack-contrib/rstack-examples/blob/main/rspress/basic/docs/guide/index.md#2025-04-21_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` --- title: Hello World --- # {frontmatter.title} ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing Dependencies and Starting the Project in Bash DESCRIPTION: Commands to enable pnpm using corepack, install dependencies, and start the development server. These steps are necessary to run any of the examples in the repository. SOURCE: https://github.com/rspack-contrib/rstack-examples/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` # Use corepack to enable pnpm corepack enable pnpm i pnpm run dev ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Basic Code Block Examples in Rspress DESCRIPTION: Demonstrating how to create code blocks in Markdown and add custom titles to them. SOURCE: https://github.com/rspack-contrib/rstack-examples/blob/main/rspress/basic/docs/guide/index.md#2025-04-21_snippet_5 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` ```js console.log('Hello World'); ``` ```js title="hello.js" console.log('Hello World'); ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Front Matter Example in YAML Format DESCRIPTION: Example of using YAML front matter at the beginning of a Markdown file to define metadata like title. SOURCE: https://github.com/rspack-contrib/rstack-examples/blob/main/rspress/basic/docs/guide/index.md#2025-04-21_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: yaml CODE: ``` --- title: Hello World --- ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Code Block with Line Highlighting in Rspress DESCRIPTION: Example of using line highlighting in code blocks along with a title, highlighting specific lines or ranges. SOURCE: https://github.com/rspack-contrib/rstack-examples/blob/main/rspress/basic/docs/guide/index.md#2025-04-21_snippet_8 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` ```js title="hello.js" {1,3-5} console.log('Hello World'); const a = 1; console.log(a); const b = 2; console.log(b); ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Styling a Div Element with JSX in Markdown DESCRIPTION: Example of a div element with inline styling using JSX syntax embedded in Markdown. The style includes a gray background color and padding, with a suggestion to modify the background color to 'tomato'. SOURCE: https://github.com/rspack-contrib/rstack-examples/blob/main/rsbuild/react-mdx/src/hello.mdx#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: jsx CODE: ```
Try and change the background color to `tomato`.
``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Building and Running NestJS Application with pnpm DESCRIPTION: Commands to build and start a NestJS project using pnpm. The first command builds the project, while the second starts the application. SOURCE: https://github.com/rspack-contrib/rstack-examples/blob/main/rspack/nestjs/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: javascript CODE: ``` pnpm run build pnpm run start ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Enabling Line Numbers in Code Blocks DESCRIPTION: Configuration example showing how to enable line numbers for code blocks in the Rspress config file. SOURCE: https://github.com/rspack-contrib/rstack-examples/blob/main/rspress/basic/docs/guide/index.md#2025-04-21_snippet_6 LANGUAGE: typescript CODE: ``` export default { // ... markdown: { showLineNumbers: true, }, }; ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Starting the Development Server DESCRIPTION: Command to start the development server for local development. SOURCE: https://github.com/rspack-contrib/rstack-examples/blob/main/rsbuild/emotion/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` pnpm dev ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Running Unit Tests DESCRIPTION: Command to execute unit tests using Jest test framework. SOURCE: https://github.com/rspack-contrib/rstack-examples/blob/main/rsbuild/react-jest/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` pnpm test ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Starting the Development Server DESCRIPTION: Command to launch the development server for local development and testing. SOURCE: https://github.com/rspack-contrib/rstack-examples/blob/main/rsbuild/react-jest/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` pnpm dev ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Previewing Production Build Locally for Rsbuild Project DESCRIPTION: Command to serve the production build locally for testing before deployment, allowing verification of the built application. SOURCE: https://github.com/rspack-contrib/rstack-examples/blob/main/rsbuild/react-tailwindcss/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` pnpm preview ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Starting Development Server DESCRIPTION: Command to start the development server for local development SOURCE: https://github.com/rspack-contrib/rstack-examples/blob/main/rsbuild/svelte/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` pnpm dev ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Starting Development Server for Rsbuild Project DESCRIPTION: Command to start the development server for local development using pnpm. SOURCE: https://github.com/rspack-contrib/rstack-examples/blob/main/rsbuild/fastify/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` pnpm dev ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring Robot.txt for Full Web Crawler Access DESCRIPTION: This snippet defines the robots.txt file content, allowing all user agents unrestricted access to the website. It uses the standard syntax as defined by robotstxt.org. SOURCE: https://github.com/rspack-contrib/rstack-examples/blob/main/rspack/cra-ts/public/robots.txt#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: plaintext CODE: ``` # https://www.robotstxt.org/robotstxt.html User-agent: * Disallow: ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Starting Development Server for Rsbuild Project DESCRIPTION: Command to start the development server for local development of the Rsbuild project. SOURCE: https://github.com/rspack-contrib/rstack-examples/blob/main/rsbuild/shadcn-ui/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` pnpm dev ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Previewing Production Build of Rsbuild Project DESCRIPTION: Command to preview the production build locally before deployment. This allows testing the production build in a local environment. SOURCE: https://github.com/rspack-contrib/rstack-examples/blob/main/rsbuild/solid/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` pnpm preview ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Starting Development Server DESCRIPTION: Command to start the development server for local development. SOURCE: https://github.com/rspack-contrib/rstack-examples/blob/main/rsbuild/stylex/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` pnpm dev ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Previewing Production Build of Rsbuild Project Locally DESCRIPTION: This command allows you to preview the production build of the Rsbuild project on your local machine before deployment. SOURCE: https://github.com/rspack-contrib/rstack-examples/blob/main/rsbuild/query-raw/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` pnpm preview ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Starting Development Server in Rsbuild DESCRIPTION: Command to start the development server for a Rsbuild project using pnpm. SOURCE: https://github.com/rspack-contrib/rstack-examples/blob/main/rsbuild/vue3-eslint/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` pnpm dev ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Previewing Production Build of Rsbuild Project DESCRIPTION: Command to preview the production build locally before deployment. This allows testing the production build in a local environment to verify functionality. SOURCE: https://github.com/rspack-contrib/rstack-examples/blob/main/rsbuild/vue3-auto-import/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` pnpm preview ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Starting Development Server for Rsbuild Project DESCRIPTION: This command starts the development server for the Rsbuild project, allowing for real-time development and testing. SOURCE: https://github.com/rspack-contrib/rstack-examples/blob/main/rsbuild/query-raw/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` pnpm dev ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Previewing Production Build Locally DESCRIPTION: Command to preview the production build locally before deployment using pnpm. SOURCE: https://github.com/rspack-contrib/rstack-examples/blob/main/rsbuild/fastify/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` pnpm preview ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Building Rsbuild Project for Production DESCRIPTION: Command to create an optimized production build of the application. SOURCE: https://github.com/rspack-contrib/rstack-examples/blob/main/rsbuild/react-eslint/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` pnpm build ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Previewing Production Build DESCRIPTION: Command to locally preview the production build before deployment to verify functionality. SOURCE: https://github.com/rspack-contrib/rstack-examples/blob/main/rsbuild/preact/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` pnpm preview ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Building Rsbuild Project for Production DESCRIPTION: Command to build the application for production deployment. This creates optimized, minified bundles ready for deployment to a production environment. SOURCE: https://github.com/rspack-contrib/rstack-examples/blob/main/rsbuild/vue3-auto-import/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` pnpm build ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Building Rsbuild Project for Production DESCRIPTION: Command to build the Rsbuild application for production deployment using PNPM. SOURCE: https://github.com/rspack-contrib/rstack-examples/blob/main/rsbuild/lit/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` pnpm build ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Previewing Production Build DESCRIPTION: Command to serve and preview the production build locally before deployment. SOURCE: https://github.com/rspack-contrib/rstack-examples/blob/main/rsbuild/react-jest/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` pnpm preview ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Building for Production DESCRIPTION: Command to create an optimized production build of the application. SOURCE: https://github.com/rspack-contrib/rstack-examples/blob/main/rsbuild/react-jest/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` pnpm build ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Building Rsbuild Project for Production DESCRIPTION: This command builds the Rsbuild project for production, optimizing and bundling the application for deployment. SOURCE: https://github.com/rspack-contrib/rstack-examples/blob/main/rsbuild/vue2/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` pnpm build ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Previewing Production Build DESCRIPTION: Command to locally preview the production build before deployment. SOURCE: https://github.com/rspack-contrib/rstack-examples/blob/main/rsbuild/react-compiler-babel/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` pnpm preview ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Building Rsbuild Project for Production DESCRIPTION: Command to create an optimized production build of the Rsbuild project. SOURCE: https://github.com/rspack-contrib/rstack-examples/blob/main/rsbuild/shadcn-ui/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` pnpm build ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Building Rsbuild Project for Production DESCRIPTION: Command to build the Rsbuild application for production deployment using pnpm. SOURCE: https://github.com/rspack-contrib/rstack-examples/blob/main/rsbuild/vue3-eslint/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` pnpm build ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Starting Development Server for Rsbuild Project DESCRIPTION: Command to launch the development server with hot module replacement for local development and testing. SOURCE: https://github.com/rspack-contrib/rstack-examples/blob/main/rsbuild/react-tailwindcss/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` pnpm dev ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Starting the Development Server for Rsbuild Project DESCRIPTION: Command to start the development server for local development. This launches the application in development mode with hot-reloading and other development features. SOURCE: https://github.com/rspack-contrib/rstack-examples/blob/main/rsbuild/vue3-auto-import/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` pnpm dev ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Building Rsbuild Project for Production DESCRIPTION: This command builds the Rsbuild project for production, optimizing and bundling all assets for deployment. SOURCE: https://github.com/rspack-contrib/rstack-examples/blob/main/rsbuild/styled-jsx/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` pnpm build ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Starting Development Server for Rsbuild Project DESCRIPTION: This command starts the development server for the Rsbuild project, allowing for live development and testing. SOURCE: https://github.com/rspack-contrib/rstack-examples/blob/main/rsbuild/react/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` pnpm dev ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Starting Development Server for Rsbuild Project DESCRIPTION: Launches the development server for the Rsbuild project. This command is used during the development phase to run the application with hot-reloading. SOURCE: https://github.com/rspack-contrib/rstack-examples/blob/main/rsbuild/umd/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` pnpm dev ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Previewing Production Build Locally DESCRIPTION: Command to run a local server that serves the production build for testing purposes. SOURCE: https://github.com/rspack-contrib/rstack-examples/blob/main/rsbuild/react-eslint/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` pnpm preview ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Starting Development Server for Rsbuild Project DESCRIPTION: Command to start the development server for local development and testing of the Rsbuild project. SOURCE: https://github.com/rspack-contrib/rstack-examples/blob/main/rsbuild/vue3-element-plus/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` pnpm dev ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Building for Production in Rsbuild Project DESCRIPTION: Command to build the application for production deployment using pnpm. This creates optimized production-ready files in the output directory. SOURCE: https://github.com/rspack-contrib/rstack-examples/blob/main/rsbuild/ssr-express-with-manifest/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` pnpm build ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Previewing Production Build of Rsbuild Project Locally DESCRIPTION: This command allows you to preview the production build of the Rsbuild project on your local machine before deployment. SOURCE: https://github.com/rspack-contrib/rstack-examples/blob/main/rsbuild/express/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` pnpm preview ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Starting Development Server in Rsbuild Project DESCRIPTION: Command to start the development server for the Rsbuild project. This launches a local development environment with hot reloading. SOURCE: https://github.com/rspack-contrib/rstack-examples/blob/main/rsbuild/ssr-express/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` pnpm dev ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Building Production Bundle DESCRIPTION: Command to create an optimized production build of the application SOURCE: https://github.com/rspack-contrib/rstack-examples/blob/main/rsbuild/svelte/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` pnpm build ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Previewing Production Build Locally in Rsbuild Project DESCRIPTION: Command for previewing the production build of the application in a local environment. SOURCE: https://github.com/rspack-contrib/rstack-examples/blob/main/rsbuild/vanilla-extract/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` pnpm preview ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Starting the Development Server for Rsbuild Project DESCRIPTION: Command for starting the development server to run the application in development mode. SOURCE: https://github.com/rspack-contrib/rstack-examples/blob/main/rsbuild/vanilla-extract/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` pnpm dev ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Building Rsbuild Project for Production DESCRIPTION: Builds the Rsbuild project for production deployment. This command creates optimized and minified assets ready for production use. SOURCE: https://github.com/rspack-contrib/rstack-examples/blob/main/rsbuild/umd/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` pnpm build ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Previewing Production Build of Rsbuild Project Locally DESCRIPTION: This command allows for local preview of the production build of the Rsbuild project, simulating a production environment. SOURCE: https://github.com/rspack-contrib/rstack-examples/blob/main/rsbuild/react/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` pnpm preview ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Starting Development Server DESCRIPTION: Command to start the development server for local testing and development. SOURCE: https://github.com/rspack-contrib/rstack-examples/blob/main/rsbuild/preact/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` pnpm dev ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Building Rsbuild Project for Production DESCRIPTION: This command builds the Rsbuild project for production, optimizing and bundling the application for deployment. SOURCE: https://github.com/rspack-contrib/rstack-examples/blob/main/rsbuild/react-tailwindcss-v4/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` pnpm build ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Previewing Production Build of Rsbuild Project Locally DESCRIPTION: This command allows for local preview of the production build of the Rsbuild project, simulating the deployed environment. SOURCE: https://github.com/rspack-contrib/rstack-examples/blob/main/rsbuild/react-tailwindcss-v4/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` pnpm preview ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Starting Development Server for Rsbuild Project DESCRIPTION: This command starts the development server for the Rsbuild project, allowing for live development and testing. SOURCE: https://github.com/rspack-contrib/rstack-examples/blob/main/rsbuild/vue3-vant/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` pnpm dev ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Building for Production DESCRIPTION: Command to build the application for production deployment, which typically includes optimizations and minification. SOURCE: https://github.com/rspack-contrib/rstack-examples/blob/main/rsbuild/preact/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` pnpm build ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Previewing Production Build of Rsbuild Project DESCRIPTION: Command to preview the production build locally before deployment. This serves the built files to verify they work correctly. SOURCE: https://github.com/rspack-contrib/rstack-examples/blob/main/rsbuild/ssr-express/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` pnpm preview ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Starting Development Server for Rsbuild Project DESCRIPTION: This command starts the development server for the Rsbuild project, allowing for live development and hot reloading. SOURCE: https://github.com/rspack-contrib/rstack-examples/blob/main/rsbuild/vue2/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` pnpm dev ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Building for Production DESCRIPTION: Command to build the Rsbuild application for production deployment. SOURCE: https://github.com/rspack-contrib/rstack-examples/blob/main/rsbuild/vue3/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` pnpm build ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Previewing Production Build DESCRIPTION: Command to locally preview the production build before deployment. SOURCE: https://github.com/rspack-contrib/rstack-examples/blob/main/rsbuild/vue3/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` pnpm preview ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Starting Development Server for Rsbuild Project DESCRIPTION: This command starts the development server for the Rsbuild project, allowing for real-time development and testing. SOURCE: https://github.com/rspack-contrib/rstack-examples/blob/main/rsbuild/react-tailwindcss-v4/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` pnpm dev ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Building for Production DESCRIPTION: Command to build the application for production deployment, creating optimized assets. SOURCE: https://github.com/rspack-contrib/rstack-examples/blob/main/rsbuild/react-compiler-babel/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` pnpm build ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Previewing Production Build DESCRIPTION: Command to preview the production build locally before deployment. SOURCE: https://github.com/rspack-contrib/rstack-examples/blob/main/rsbuild/styled-components/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` pnpm preview ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Starting Rsbuild Development Server DESCRIPTION: Command to start the development server for local development and testing.
